channel.title: How To Change Home But Same Npc?
channel.description: hi i got this shitty home(Varrock Gay)and i wanna change it to somewhere else please help me. i already know you haft to go to Client.Notepad and type in ctrl+f(tox and toy) BUT THERES SO MUCH TOX AND TOY I DONT KNOW WHICH 1 IS THE HOME TOX AND TOY PLEASE HELP ME.AND ALSO HOW DO I MAKE THE OLD NPC'S FROM MY OLD HOME START AT THE NEW HOME.

item.title: How To Change Home But Same Npc?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. kill urself
  2. don’t revive.

No, just kidding. I’m not like that anymore o_O’

I do suggest you learn java before you attempt at a private server, otherwise this could become very confusing for you.

If you want to change the co-ordinates of an NPC, they can be modified in the autospawn.cfg file which is located inside a folder called “cfg” (usually). If not, it will be in the same place as your classes (again, usually).

For your home coords problem, you have to go into the Player class (player.java) to edit where the player is spawned upon account creation. Just search for:

initial

The coords the player spawns at should be defined right below the first result.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change Home But Same Npc?
